dc_title_s: Watershed Assessment 1:24,000 Hydrography: Russian River Basin, California. 1998-2002
dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents hydrographic features of the Russian River basin in California. This layer was derived from the original Watershed Assessment 1:24,000 Hydrography data created by the California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection.Provides seamless enhanced hydrography data by river basin, modified for hydrologic modeling.
